name: Knightpath: Low Rez
description:
Knightpath is a small metroidvania game made for the LOWREZJAM 2021.

A controller is HIGHLY recommended. Controller support does not work properly in the web version using some browsers. If your controller is not working in the browser, I recommend downloading the game or trying a different browser.

Assets used:

Sound Effects from https://kenney.nl/assets and https://freesound.org/

Explosion effect from https://limofeus.itch.io/pixel-simulations
